title: Ten Life Changing Lessons
description: Ten Life Changing Lessons is a unique and powerful book, which outlines ten effective methods, to create immediate, dramatic and lasting changes in most aspects of your life. Written from the authorâ€™s personal perspective and experiences, with a deep sense of openness and honesty, the book provides numerous guidelines for the transformation of various relationships, professional life, and some critical essentials to personal happiness. Focusing on the simple actions that make change possible, Winsome Campbell-Green masterfully describes her own perceptions and experiences, while inviting the reader to examine how each lesson resonate with his or her own life. This book is recommended for anyone looking to change their thoughts and lives in order to make better life choices.
author: Winsome Campbell-Green
